actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

actions.subcommittee: Capital Markets, Insurance and Government Sponsored Enterprises
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Capital Markets, Insurance and Government Sponsored Enterprises.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Capital Markets, Insurance and Government Sponsored Enterprises

official_title: To amend the Federal National Mortgage Association Charter Act and the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation Act to remove certain competitive advantages granted to the housing-related government-sponsored enterprises relative to other secondary mortgage market enterprises, and for other purposes.
short_title: Secondary Mortgage Market Fair Competition Act

summary.text: Secondary Mortgage Market Fair Competition Act - Amends the Federal National Mortgage Association Charter Act (Fannie Mae) and the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation Act (Freddie Mac) to repeal the State and local tax exemption.

titles.title: Secondary Mortgage Market Fair Competition Act

To amend the Federal National Mortgage Association Charter Act and the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation Act to remove certain competitive advantages granted to the housing-related government-sponsored enterprises relative to other secondary mortgage market enterprises, and for other purposes.
